anathema: Kill something that cannot significantly harm you, bargain with  Asmodeus
edict: Confuse paths and roads, outwit your foes instead of overpowering them, unleash beasts to kill others
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Baphomet (Lord of the Labyrinth)](/Deities.aspx?ID=427)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 302

Baphomet, Lord of the Labyrinth, is the demon lord of beasts, dungeons, and traitors. Baphomet was originally a consort of [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=287) who achieved demon lord status after escaping from imprisonment in a labyrinth constructed by [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278). Baphomet appears as an enormous emaciated [minotaur](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=444) with feathered wings and a goat-like head that bears three horns, as well as a blazing pentagram branded into his forehead. As a lord of beasts, he grants his blessings to wild animals (like [bears](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=370), [dinosaurs](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=391), and [sharks](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=470)) who kill humanoids, whether accidentally or intentionally. Baphomet’s cults are among the most prolific in [Golarion](/Rules.aspx?ID=3298)—human-dominated secret societies devoted to the demon lord are present in many cities and may have members ensconced in positions of political power.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Confuse paths and roads, outwit your foes instead of overpowering them, unleash beasts to kill others

**Anathema** Kill something that cannot significantly harm you, bargain with [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278)

**Area of Concern**
Beasts, dungeons, traitors

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49)

**Favored Weapon** [Glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=375)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Disorientation](/Domains.aspx?ID=105)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=1694)

- **2nd**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=1514)

- **8th**
[Quandary](/Spells.aspx?ID=1644)

</column>
name: Baphomet (Lord of the Labyrinth)
